name: To-Fu Ninja - Fruit Yama Style
description:
How many bananas you can steal?
You are a To-Fu Ninja. Try to get more bananas.
It's the 8-bit retro game for iPhones, iPads & iPods.

[How to play]
-Tap left/right side of screen to get bananas.
-Don't collide the sword.

[Warning]
This game is difficult.
